description:
An app for reading docs and help files. It has all the features it should... 

...except for ONE single but important feature... 

That missing feature turns an otherwise great app into useless bloat for anyone who prefer working in dimly lit or dark environments.

The brightest whitest color one can mix (#FFFFFF) is ALWAYS used for document background. This is painful if you sit for hours in the dark before you suddenly need to check the docs.

No way to customize it, no obvious way to hack a work-around since custom css seems to be blocked or ignored.
c'est bien pour les débutant et vraiment très pratique
